title: Effects of solar thermal in district heating systems – the case of parabolic trough collectors in a high-latitude region
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00607K, Paper

Truong Nguyen, Itai Danielski, Benjamin Ahlgren, Gireesh Nair
This study investigates primary energy use and CO2 emission reduction potential resulted by the integration of solar thermal heating in biomass-based district heating systems in high-latitude regions. A newly commissioned...
